name: Just another Day (Jeremia, Manubown)
description:
!!Epilepsy Warning!!

 

 

Starring:

Fuse Box

Sink

Washing Machine

Tools used:
Visual Studio - for programming
Rider - for programming
Unity - for game developing
Paint.Net - for creating pictures
Firefox - for searching music

Credits:
Programmed by Jeremia and Manubown.
Visual Design by Debora.

The player model is the same we used in the last ludum dare gamejam and was made by Ester.

All music was taken from the internet:
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Blue_Dot_Sessions/RadioPink/Pinky
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Blue_Dot_Sessions/RadioPink/Speaker_Joy
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Blue_Dot_Sessions/RadioPink/Night_Watch
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Soularflair/CUES_for_film_TV_games_etc_BUSY_1...

All soundeffects were taken from the internet:
https://freesound.org/people/nckn/sounds/256112/
https://freesound.org/people/Breviceps/sounds/456804

The glitch effect was taken from the internet:
https://github.com/staffantan/unityglitch
